body_html: I didn't review the code closely, but IIUC you are not sharing storage with the old tensor are you? Since this is the case, you should not call it narrow, as part of the API contract of narrow is that it shares storage.
body_text: I didn't review the code closely, but IIUC you are not sharing storage with the old tensor are you? Since this is the case, you should not call it narrow, as part of the API contract of narrow is that it shares storage.
body: I didn't review the code closely, but IIUC you are not sharing storage with the old tensor are you? Since this is the case, you should not call it `narrow`, as part of the API contract of narrow is that it shares storage.
